description: Starts the process of revoking the viewer session associated with a specified channel ARN and viewer ID. Optionally, you can provide a version to revoke viewer sessions less than and including that version. For instructions on associating a viewer ID with a viewer session, see Setting Up Private Channels.

parameters.name: channelArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the channel associated with the viewer session to revoke.

parameters.name: viewerId
parameters.description: The ID of the viewer associated with the viewer session to revoke. Do not use this field for personally identifying, confidential, or sensitive information.
